text: Once Upon a Time is the seventh studio album by Scottish band Simple Minds and was released on 21 October, 1985 through Virgin. It went to number 1 in the United Kingdom and the Netherlands, number 10 in the United States, number 4 in Sweden, number 7 in Switzerland and Australia and number 3 in New Zealand, Canada and Germany. ==Track listing== ;Note *The 'deluxe edition' of Once Upon a Time consists of disc 1 (The Original Album) and disc 2 (B-Sides and Rarities). *The 'super deluxe edition' of Once Upon a Time consists of all 6 discs. ==References== Category:1985 albums Category:Simple Minds albums
title: Once Upon a Time (Simple Minds album)
